about_the_game:
He is back. Once again take control of mass serial killer John Wade. Six years later, the infamous Pale Grin resurrects from the grave to terrorize the broken town of Happyhills. This time he has more on his mind than simple killing.

Not only John, but also the motivated detective, Bryan Pawalski, is back in action. Determined to take down John Wade once and for all. Next to Bryan, another assailant joins the fray: Mr Carpenter. This man is set out on a warpath to take revenge on the death of his beloved daughter Madison.

Who will live and who will die?

Play through this stylish retro 80s game as none other than THE John Wade, Detective Pawalski and Mr Carpenter. Each character has a different playstyle to mix up the gameplay.

The game features:

  • 20 different levels with each an unique approach as how to complete it.

  • A mysterious and gripping storyline.

  • Puzzle solving like no other. Determine how to eliminate every foe in your path.

  • No kill is the same, every victim leaves the land of the living in a unique way.

  • Find creative murder weapons.

  • Put your detective skills to the test to locate important clues and get one step closer to John Wade.

  • Action packed levels as Mr Carpenter, loaded with a trusty sawn-off shotgun. Breach doors en make choices as to spare or kill a victim.

  • Discover new and creative parts of Happyhills, a slaughterhouse or the police department for example.

  • Tons of references to famous horror movies.

content_descriptors.notes: There is a lot of gore and blood involved in this game, it's basically what it's all about. The depictions of gore are all unrealistic and cartoon styled, but they heavily imply reality.
